AuthenticatorAttestationResponseGetPubli.summary: The getPublicKey() method of the interface returns an {{jsxref("ArrayBuffer")}} containing the DER SubjectPublicKeyInfo of the new credential (see Subject Public Key Info), or null if this is not available.

remarks.para: This is a convenience function, created to allow easy access to the public key. This key will need to be stored in order to verify future authentication operations (i.e., using ).

AuthenticatorAttestationResponseGetPubli.returns: An containing the DER SubjectPublicKeyInfo of the new credential (see Subject Public Key Info), or null if this is not available.
